content: on the other i change the start of the round to be at the beginning of the instep stitches by placing a marker there all other markers can be removed during the next round of knitting foot continue in pattern as set across the instep stitches and work the sole stitches in stocking stitch knit all stitches continue until your work is 2 shorter than the desired length of the foot toe discontinue the lace pattern / panel setup row knit 16 pm knit to end of needle pm knit 16 pm knit to end of needle pm i don t actually place a marker at the end of the needle i just know that the end of the needle is my marker row 1 knit to 2 stitches before marker k2tog x4 row 2 knit all stitches repeat these 2 row 9 more times 24 stitches remain repeat row 1 5 more times 4 stitches remain cut your yarn leaving a long tail for finishing your sock using a darning needle thread your yarn through the remaining stitches on the needles pull tight to gather them and sew in your ends securely j page 6 of 6
